revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=2Wire |model=HomePortal 1000 |revision=HW |asin= |manuf_country=Malaysia |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=uncommon |type=access point,dsl modem |fcc_date=09/04/2003 |fcc_id=PGR2WHPLHW |pcb_id= |pwr_v=6 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=2Wire |cpu1_model=Medusa;3000-000171-006, eC575563-1; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=M-Systems |fla1_model=MD2811-D16-V3Q18 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Unigen |ram1_model=UGSV1286T-75 |ram1_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=ACX100 |wi1_chip2_brand=Maxim |wi1_chip2_model=MAX2820 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Kendin |eth_chip2_model=KS8721B |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=2WIREXXX |default_ssid_regex=^2WIRE[0-9]{3}$ |default_ip=172.16.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:12:88 |oui_eth=00:12:88 }} :[http://support.2wire.com/index.php?page=view&article=768 Support page] (Pace) {{â€¢}} [http://support.2wire.com/view/768/1000_User_Guide.pdf User guide]
"CHIPBOY-SLI" is silkscreened on the board.
The CPU ([http://happytrees.org/chips?page=manufacturer&manufacturer=2WIRE&family=TriMedia on the CPU ''Grave Yard'']) has a ''TriMedia'' core. :Device also has a [[Silicon Labs]] Si3101 and HW2000 on board.
The default SSID is '''2WIRE''' followed by the last three digits of the serial number. :The default WEP key is printed on the unit under the serial number. :The device has no reset button. Resettting the password appears :to require 2Wire support to provide a temporary password..
==Images== <gallery caption="board scans"> File:2Wire HomePortal 1000HW board top.jpg|board top File:2Wire HomePortal 1000HW board bot.jpg|board bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
